attributes.action: To ensure that the Service Road is kept clean and clear by Harrow Council
attributes.additional_details:
We need the council to take action immediately by keeping this road clean and clear at all times. This can be done by:

· emptying the bins more frequently
·  providing additional bins
·  holding the occupents of homes/shops To account
·  providing adequate lighting
·  installing CCTV
 
We now need Harrow Council to take notice, especially with an election looming, by YOU, our Priestmead community and local area residents, to sign this online petition.

Thank you.
attributes.background:
The Service Road by Priestmead Primary School parallel to the back of the shops on Kenton Lane, is used by children, parents, carers, staff and the local residents. 
However, on a daily basis this road is used to dump rubbish.

Children should not be exposed to this let alone other stakeholders.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
